con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-Logins
con:testCase.con:description: Tests different logins for created users and admins

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>User with name=UserNotExist is unknown.</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:fault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime"> <specificFaultType>BUSINESS_ERROR_PROCESSING_DENIED</specificFaultType> <errorMessage>User with name=UserNotExist is unknown.</errorMessage> <errorCode>2000001122</errorCode> </ns2:fault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>User with name=UserNotExist is unknown.</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:fault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime"> <specificFaultType>BUSINESS_ERROR_PROCESSING_DENIED</specificFaultType> <errorMessage>User with name=UserNotExist is unknown.</errorMessage> <errorCode>2000001122</errorCode> </ns2:fault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: 5030N-createUser-Twice
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <v1:createUser> <newUser> <!--type: username--> <username>${#TestCase#User-Name}</username> <!--type: username--> <password>${#TestSuite#Password}</password> <!--type: boolean--> <adUser>false</adUser> <!--type: string--> <role>CS_AGENT</role> <userTenants> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <tenants> <!--type: int--> <id>${#TestCase#tenant-ID}</id> <!--type: string256--> <name>${#TestCase#tenant-Name}</name> </tenants> </userTenants> <!--type: createComment--> <createComment>${=context.getCurrentStep().getLabel()}</createComment> </newUser> </v1:createUser> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
